title: Pictogram for Gratis
content:
I have to design a pictogram for a congress hotel catalog depicting free local phone calls.

¿How do you put free in a pictogram?
author: rs_donsata

comments.content:
Let’s see...  
a phone symbol with a tartan kind of background? hmm...  
free \> free like a bird... a cloud, a rainbow... hey, how about a bird? wings? phone calls \> sound transmission \> a songbird maybe?

Chirp chirp cheep,  
Günni
dollar sign inside a circle-slash icon?

<cite>dollar sign inside a circle-slash icon?</cite>

Naw, they’d just think it took euros only.

Some times a word is worth a thousand pictures.

trust me, I know.

-=®=-
Isn’t just a phone enough? I assume that every hotel offers telephone service, but if not, then make a phone with a $ for those that charge, and a phone w/o for the free ones.

It depends on what language this will be in, and how tongue-in-cheek you want to get. Since English has no distinction between <cite>gratis</cite> and <cite>libre</cite> - both are “free” - you could depict a phone with wings flying out of a birdcage (that is if it is an English brochure and you are allowed to get a little cute with it).

- Lex

Thanks a lot for the answers. We ended up using the pictogram of a telephone with a raised handset in an inviting way. I think this will do fine since the user is expected to be highly contextualized.

Héctor

Sounds good. I’d love to see it when you’re all done.

Interesting, nice work, im currently looking at pictograms in my studies.

Question though, if you were allowed to use the letters; “24hr” in one icon, why just not use the word “free” above the phone... free phone.

Pictograms are freaking hard i reckon.

Actually, I find pictograms incredibly interesting, I see them as an important advancement into our visual language.

In theory they are basically like Hieroglyphics yet at the same time a product of modernism.

Yes, I get very entertained sketching pictograms for whatever is needed.

Well I didn’t use the words because I think that the context will help to clarify the pictogram.
